resources.string: Discover a modern way to ensuring your fish\'s health. Ifishy allows you to detect fish diseases with just one click.
Utilize advanced AI technology to identify symptoms early with one click and take action before it\'s too late!
Connect with others to discuss challenges, share experiences, and find solutions for maintaining healthy fish together!
Make sure to give your fish the love and care they deserve from this moment forward!
Please enter your information to join with us
18 of The Most Common Fish Diseases

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections.

1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.
How do I use the fish disease scan feature?
What else can I find in the Home menu?
How do I view my scan history?
What are the features available in the Community menu?
Can I save posts or articles from the app?
How do I update the information in the Profile menu?
Does this app require an internet connection?
Is the data I upload in the app safe?
How can I report bugs or provide feedback on the app?
iFishy is an application designed to assist users in detecting diseases in fish through a scan feature. In addition, the app provides articles, community forums, disease history and user profiles.
Simply take or upload a photo of your fish using the app\'s scan feature. The system will analyze the image and provide information on the fish\'s possible diseases.
The Home menu features various articles and current posts relevant to fish health, care tips, and other interesting information about the world of fish.
The disease scan history can be accessed via the History menu. There, you can see a list of previous scans, complete with dates and related information.
The Community menu allows you to create posts about fish and their diseases, comment on others\' posts, and upvote or downvote to rate the relevance or quality of a topic.
Currently, you can bookmark articles or posts for later reading. Simply click the Save option available on each article or post.
You can update your information in the Profile menu by selecting the Edit Profile button. From there, you can change data such as your name, profile photo, and other personal information.
Yes, iFishy requires an internet connection to access features such as disease scans, articles, community posts, and user data synchronization.
Yes, iFishy uses an encryption system to protect user data. Your personal information and scan results can only be accessed by you.
You can report bugs or provide feedback via the development team via email
